name: Stock Report
query:
SELECT
    sle.company AS "Company:Data:200",
    sle.item_code AS "Item Code:Data:200",

    it.item_name AS "Item Name:Data:200",
    it.item_group AS "Item Group:Data:200",
    it.custom_product_type AS "Product Type:Data:200",

    sle.warehouse AS "Warehouse:Data:200",
    sle.serial_and_batch_bundle AS "Serial No./Sim No:Data:200",
    sle.posting_date AS "Inward Date:Date:120",

    sn.status AS "Status:Data:120",

    sle.voucher_no AS "Voucher No:Data:150"

FROM
    `tabStock Ledger Entry` sle

LEFT JOIN `tabItem` it
    ON it.item_code = sle.item_code

LEFT JOIN `tabSerial_and_Batch_Bundle` sbb
    ON sbb.name = sle.serial_and_batch_bundle

LEFT JOIN `tabSerial_and_Batch_Bundle_Item` sbb_item
    ON sbb_item.parent = sbb.name

LEFT JOIN `tabSerial No` sn
    ON sn.name = sbb_item.serial_no

ORDER BY
    sle.posting_date DESC;
